programme.title: Roohi
programme.desc: Bhawra and Kattanni kidnap Roohi on the orders of Guniya, who wants to marry her off to his client. However, they realise Roohi is possessed by a demon.

programme.title: Baby (2015)
programme.desc: An elite team of the Indian intelligence system perpetually strives to detect and eliminate terrorists and their plots. Officer Ajay leads a team to destroy one such potentially lethal operation.

programme.title: Chalo Jeete Hai
programme.desc: An impressionable young boy, Naru's pursuit of the meaning of life by doing the most he can for others. This film is inspired by true life events from Indian PM Modi's life.

programme.title: Ishwar Sakshi
programme.desc: A man promises to marry his daughter to a young man in front of Vishnu idol. Later the father refuses and the young man appeals to Vishnu for help.

programme.title: Gunday (2014)
programme.desc: Bikram and Bala aspire to take over the coal mafia. However, they fall in love with the same woman, which leads to a rift forming between the two.

programme.title: Sarkar Raj
programme.desc: Maharashtra's most powerful family faces conflict when Vishnu departs, never to return. The evil forces gang up to bring down the regime of Sarkar. Release Year: 2008 Director: Ram Gopal Varma

programme.title: Judwaa 2
programme.desc: 2017 Action-comedy. Raja and Prem Varun, twins separated at birth, join forces as adults to take down a smuggling kingpin, who threatens to destroy their family. Also stars Jacqueline and Taapsee. Release Year: 2017 Director: David Dhawan

programme.title: Tubelight
programme.desc: A small town in the hills of northern India, and tells the story of Laxman's Salman Khan love for his brother Bharat Sohail Khan and his unshakeable belief in himself. Release Year: 2017 Director: Kabir Khan

programme.title: Phillauri
programme.desc: As he is a Manglik, NRI Kanan grudgingly gets married to a tree. Release Year: 2017 Director: Anshai Lal

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
programme.desc: The retired con couple Bunty and Babli are forced to rejoin the business to thwart the attempts of a young duo that robs people with their trademark sigil and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Vikram: Hitlist
programme.desc: A special agent investigates a murder committed by a masked group of serial killers. However, a tangled maze of clues soon leads him to the drug kingpin of Chennai.

programme.title: Daagdi Chaawl
programme.desc: An incident brings a simple man, Surya Ankush, to face-to-face with Daddy Makarand, an underworld don, which slowly and unwittingly drags him into the world of crime.

programme.title: The Front Row With Anupama Chopra S01
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Taxi No. 9211
programme.desc: 2006/Slice-of-life One day Jai John Abraham is to inherit his dad's property, he clashes with taxi driver Raghav Nana Patekar. Their fight teaches them a lesson, changing their lives forever.

programme.title: Sanam Re (2016)
programme.desc: A man focused on his career finds solace when he reunites with his childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Side Effects
programme.desc: A complicated relationship develops between a man and woman after getting married and having a baby. Release Year: 2014 Director: Saket Chaudhary

programme.title: Hum Hai Rahi Pyar Ke
programme.desc: Rahul looks after his spoilt nephews, Sunny and Vicky, and niece, Munni. When they go to a funfair, they meet Vyjayanti, who has run away from home, and decide to shelter her without Rahul's consent.

programme.title: Guest Iin London
programme.desc: Aryan and his wife are saddled with the responsibility of uninvited guests, who have a dozen desi quirks and no sense of boundaries. Release Year: 2017 Director: Ashwani Dhir

programme.title: Gour Hari Dastaan
programme.desc: When the son of Gour Hari Das, a freedom fighter, is denied admission in school due to a lack of a Freedom Fighter's Certificate.

programme.title: Jayeshbhai Jordaar
programme.desc: A timid Jayesh must defy his patriarchal family as he flees with his wife to save their unborn daughter from foeticide.

programme.title: Tadap
programme.desc: Ishana and Ramisa share a passionate relationship, but everything changes between them when Ramisa's father learns about their secret affair.

programme.title: David
programme.desc: Three different men named David, who are about to take a step which is going to change their lives forever. It stars Vikram, Neil Nitin Mukesh and Tabu. Release Year: 2013 Director: Bejoy Nambiar

programme.title: The Front Row With Anupama Chopra S01
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Chalo Jeete Hain
programme.desc: An impressionable boy is struck hard by Swami Vivekananda's quote, 'Wahi jeete hain, jo doosro ke liye jeete hain.' On the quest for purpose of life, he tries to pursue what he can do for others.

programme.title: Hum Do Humare Do
programme.desc: Dhruv, who grew up an orphan, is in love with a woman who wishes to marry someone with a family. In order to fulfil his lover's wish, he hires two older individuals to pose as his parents.

programme.title: Housefull 2
programme.desc: Four men Akshay, John, Ritesh and Shreyas, who help each other to fool their prospective father-in-laws creating a cascade of confusion and mayhem. Film also stars Asin and Jacquiline. Release Year: 2012 Director: Sajid Khan Awards: Zee Cine Awards- Power Club - Box Office Award- Sajid Khan. Stardust Awards- Star of the Year - Male- Akshay Kumar, People's Choice Awards- Favorite Comedy Movie, Favorite Comedy Movie Star

programme.title: Ishq
programme.desc: Ranjit and Harbanslal want their children Ajay Devgan and Madhu Juhi to marry each other. But, Madhu falls in love with Raja Aamir while Ajay falls in love with Kajal Kajol. Release Year: 1997 Director: Indra Kumar

programme.title: Mimi
programme.desc: An aspiring actress in a small town agrees to bear a child for a visiting couple seeking a surrogate mother, but her experience takes unexpected turns.

programme.title: The Big Bull
programme.desc: Hemant Shah, a man from a humble background, aspires to become rich. He soon devises a plan to exploit the loopholes in the banking system to fulfil his ambitions.

programme.title: A Thursday
programme.desc: One fateful Thursday in the city of Mumbai invites tremendous horror when Naina, a nursery school teacher, holds 16 children hostage and produces a list of unfathomable demands.

programme.title: Samrat Prithviraj
programme.desc: A fearless warrior. An epic love story. Witness the grand saga of Samrat Prithviraj Chauhan.

programme.title: Murder 2
programme.desc: Arjun, an ex-cop, is hired by gangster Sameer to locate missing call-girls. His investigations lead him to Dheeraj, a psychopath. Release Year: 2011 Director: Mohit Suri Awards: Screen Awards- Best Actor In a negative Role- Prashant Narayanan. Stardust Awards- Best actor- Emraan Hashmi. Apsara Awards- Best Actor- Emraan Hashmi.

programme.title: The President Is Coming
programme.desc: Six young contestants undergo bizarre tests and stop at nothing to top the list of the young faces responsible for shaping 'The New India' and eventually meet George Bush.

programme.title: Kshatriya (1993)
programme.desc: The royal families of Mirtagarh and Surjangarh are at war with each other. Problems arise when their younger generations refuse to continue the feud.

programme.title: Bandhan (1998)
programme.desc: Unable to bear a child, Pooja is asked to compromise with her husband's new mistress or leave the house. Pooja's brother, Raju, decides to fight for her and reunite her with her husband.

programme.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
programme.desc: An NRI couple decide to stay in his ancestral home. Inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to solve the mystery. Release Year: 2007 Director: Nupur Asthana

programme.title: Jolly LLB 2
programme.desc: A blunt, compassionate, struggling lawyer moves from Kanpur to Lucknow to pursue his dream of making it big-time. Release Year: 2017 Director: Subhash Kapoor

programme.title: Bala
programme.desc: Bala, a young man, suffers from premature balding and struggles to measure up to social beauty standards. When his insecurity threatens his marriage, he seeks the help of a dark-complexioned lawyer.

programme.title: A Thursday
programme.desc: One fateful Thursday in the city of Mumbai invites tremendous horror when Naina, a nursery school teacher, holds 16 children hostage and produces a list of unfathomable demands.

programme.title: Kahin Pyar Na Ho Jaye
programme.desc: Prem is supposed to marry Nisha but she gets married to a rich NRI. He is devastated and takes to drinking. Later, he meets Priya and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Abhay
programme.desc: 2001 Psychological thriller. Vijay's twin brother Abhay Kamal Hassan, who is mentally ill, decides to kill Vijay's fiancee, Teju Raveena Tandon as he visualizes her as his evil stepmother. Release Year: 2009 Director: Mahesh Babu

programme.title: Pyaar Karke Dekho
programme.desc: Ravi Kumar moves to Mumbai to pursue his lifelong dream of becoming a singer and dancer. He lies to his landlady that he is married but is baffled when Urvashi claims to be his wife.

programme.title: Phillauri
programme.desc: As he is a Manglik, NRI Kanan grudgingly gets married to a tree. Release Year: 2017 Director: Anshai Lal

programme.title: Hawaa Hawaai
programme.desc: 2014 Sport-drama. Arjun Partho Gupte, a poor boy working at a tea stall, aspires to become a skating champion. His dream comes true when Aniket Saqib, a skating coach, decides to train him. Release Year: 2014 Director: Amole Gupte

programme.title: Madam Chief Minister
programme.desc: A feisty woman encounters political corruption at every level as she embarks on a journey to becoming the chief minister of Uttar Pradesh.

programme.title: Traffic
programme.desc: A thriller based various real incidents that happened at a crowded traffic junction in Kochi. Inspired from the real events that happened in Chennai. Release Year: 2016 Director: Rajesh Pillai

programme.title: Dhruva (2016)
programme.desc: Dhruva, an IPS officer, discovers a strong network of organized crime. He then intends to take down the mastermind behind a huge racket and encounters numerous challenges on his way.

programme.title: Dilwale Dulhaniya Le Jayenga
programme.desc: Raj and Simran meet during a trip across Europe and the two fall in love. However, when Raj learns that Simran is already promised to another, he follows her to India to win her and her father over.

programme.title: Pink
programme.desc: 2016 Courtroom drama. When three young women Taapsee, Kirti and Andrea are involved in a crime, then a retired lawyer Amitabh Bachchan steps forward to help them clear their names. Release Year: 2016 Director: Aniruddha Roy Chowdhury

programme.title: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
programme.desc: A romantic comedy where two strangers meet and disappear, only to unite months later in the most unexpected way. Release Year: 2006 Director: Saket Chaudhary Awards: World Fest-Houston International Film Festival- Remi Award for Creative Excellence

programme.title: Vachan
programme.desc: After her elder brother dies and her father goes blind, Kamla sacrifices her love and happiness to look after the needs of her family, only to be betrayed by her loved ones. Release Year: 1955

programme.title: Vroom
programme.desc: A scientist hides a unique chip in a car to keep it from falling into the wrong hands. Why is car behaving strangely?

programme.title: Hero No. 1
programme.desc: 1997/Comedy Wealthy Rajesh Govinda loves Dinanath's granddaughter Meena Karishma Kapoor. Due to a family feud he cannot marry her and decides to enter Meena's house as a servant to win approval. Release Year: 1997 Director: David Dhawan

programme.title: Sanam Re (2016)
programme.desc: A man focused on his career finds solace when he reunites with his childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Action Jackson

programme.desc: Kunal marries Aarzoo and they migrate to SA when he gets a job at a diamond trading firm. He gets involved in the illegal activities of the company.

programme.desc: Aisha is a jet setter who tries her hand at match making. It takes a couple of disasters before she comes to her senses. Release Year: 2010 Director: Rajshree Ojha

programme.desc: Raghuvaran is an engineer whose life changes when his wife begins to control his decisions. To add to his troubles, Vasundhara, an egoistic entrepreneur, sets out to ruin his career.

programme.desc: After his son's death, Balraj tries to get Millie, his daughter-in-law, to marry Rajat, her childhood friend. However, Millie's reluctance and opposition from his family members obstruct his plan. Release Year: 2006 Director: Ravi Chopra

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
programme.desc: The retired con couple Bunty and Babli are forced to rejoin the business to thwart the attempts of a young duo that robs people with their trademark sigil and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Baadshaho
programme.desc: An Indian queen Ileana D'Cruz asks her bodyguard Ajay Devgn to steal back gold taken from her by the Indian government during The Emergency period in 1975. Release Year: 2017 Director: Milan Luthria

programme.title: Bang Bang
programme.desc: A bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Hrithik Roshan, a man who has a mysterious background. The film also stars Jimmy Shergill and Danny Denzongpa. Release Year: 2014 Director: Siddharth Anand Awards: Surfers' Choice Award - Best Music Video--Bang Bang.

programme.title: 2 States
programme.desc: Coming from two very different cultural backgrounds, Krish and Ananya find it difficult to convince their parents about their love. Release Year: 2014 Director: Abhishek Varman Awards: Best Music Director: Shankar, Ehsaan: Loy , Best Debut Director: Abhishek Varman.

programme.title: Chalo Jeete Hai
programme.desc: An impressionable young boy, Naru's pursuit of the meaning of life by doing the most he can for others. This film is inspired by true life events from Indian PM Modi's life.

programme.title: Hum Aapke Dil Mein Rehte Hain
programme.desc: A spoiled playboy agrees to marry a woman for one year to please his ailing but wealthy father. Release Year: 1999 Director: Satish Kaushik

programme.title: Luka Chuppi
programme.desc: It tells the story of a television reporter in Mathura who falls in love with a headstrong woman.

programme.title: Phillauri
programme.desc: As he is a Manglik, NRI Kanan grudgingly gets married to a tree. Release Year: 2017 Director: Anshai Lal

programme.title: Ishq
programme.desc: Ranjit and Harbanslal want their children Ajay Devgan and Madhu Juhi to marry each other. But, Madhu falls in love with Raja Aamir while Ajay falls in love with Kajal Kajol. Release Year: 1997 Director: Indra Kumar

programme.title: Housefull 4
programme.desc: Three pairs of reincarnated lovers reunite in the present day -- but the men wind up falling for the wrong women.
